## CmdOutputOptions interface

Options of the [cmdOutput()](./markdown-magic-utils.cmdoutput.md) command.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CmdOutputOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [args?](./markdown-magic-utils.cmdoutputoptions.args.md) | string\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional list of command-line arguments. |
|  [command](./markdown-magic-utils.cmdoutputoptions.command.md) | string | Shell command or executable tu run. |
|  [cwd?](./markdown-magic-utils.cmdoutputoptions.cwd.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional current working directory to use. |
|  [showCommand?](./markdown-magic-utils.cmdoutputoptions.showcommand.md) | boolean \| string | <i>(Optional)</i> Whether to print the command. Can be overridden by a custom string. |
